articles.title: 50+ –∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑ –¥–ª—è —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä–∞
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

–†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä –ø–æ-–∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏ ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—å, –≤–∫—É—Å–Ω–∞—è –µ–¥–∞ –∏ –∫—Ä–∞—Å–∏–≤—ã–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞. –û—Å–≤–æ–π—Ç–µ —ç—Ç–∏ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –¥–ª—è –Ω–µ–∑–∞–±—ã–≤–∞–µ–º–æ–≥–æ —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è!

## –í —Ä–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–Ω–µ

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Un tavolo per due, per favore"
  translation="–°—Ç–æ–ª–∏–∫ –Ω–∞ –¥–≤–æ–∏—Ö, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞"
  pronunciation="—É–Ω —Ç–∞–≤–æ–ª–æ –ø—ç—Ä –¥—É—ç, –ø—ç—Ä —Ñ–∞–≤–æ—Ä—ç"
  context="–ü—Ä–∏ –≤—Ö–æ–¥–µ –≤ —Ä–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–Ω"
/>

### –ë—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ

<VocabCard
  word="Vorrei prenotare un tavolo"
  translation="–Ø —Ö–æ—Ç–µ–ª(–∞) –±—ã –∑–∞–±—Ä–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å—Ç–æ–ª–∏–∫"
  pronunciation="–≤–æ—Ä—Ä—ç–π –ø—Ä—ç–Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ä—ç —É–Ω —Ç–∞–≤–æ–ª–æ"
  example="Vorrei prenotare un tavolo per sabato sera."
/>

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------------------|--------------|---------|
| **Avete una prenotazione?** | –∞–≤—ç—Ç—ç —É–Ω–∞ –ø—Ä—ç–Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω—ç | –£ –≤–∞—Å –µ—Å—Ç—å –±—Ä–æ–Ω—å? |
| **La prenotazione √® a nome...** | –ª–∞ –ø—Ä—ç–Ω–æ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω—ç —ç –∞ –Ω–æ–º—ç | –ë—Ä–æ–Ω—å –Ω–∞ –∏–º—è... |
| **Un tavolo tranquillo, per favore** | —É–Ω —Ç–∞–≤–æ–ª–æ —Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∫—É–∏–ª–ª–æ | –¢–∏—Ö–∏–π —Å—Ç–æ–ª–∏–∫, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞ |
| **Vicino alla finestra** | –≤–∏—á–∏–Ω–æ –∞–ª–ª–∞ —Ñ–∏–Ω—ç—Å—Ç—Ä–∞ | –£ –æ–∫–Ω–∞ |

### –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑

<VocabCard
  word="Cosa ci consiglia?"
  translation="–ß—Ç–æ –Ω–∞–º –ø–æ—Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥—É–µ—Ç–µ?"
  pronunciation="–∫–æ–∑–∞ —á–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∏–ª—å—è"
  example="Siamo qui per la prima volta. Cosa ci consiglia?"
/>

- **"Il men√π, per favore"** [–∏–ª—å –º—ç–Ω—é, –ø—ç—Ä —Ñ–∞–≤–æ—Ä—ç] ‚Äî –ú–µ–Ω—é, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞
- **"Per me..."** [–ø—ç—Ä –º—ç] ‚Äî –î–ª—è –º–µ–Ω—è...
- **"Possiamo dividere?"** [–ø–æ—Å—Å—å—è–º–æ –¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—ç—Ä—ç] ‚Äî –ú–æ–∂–µ–º —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª–∏—Ç—å?
- **"√à piccante?"** [—ç –ø–∏–∫–∫–∞–Ω—Ç—ç] ‚Äî –≠—Ç–æ –æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ?

<CultureTip title="–ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è —Ç—Ä–∞–ø–µ–∑–∞" flag="üáÆüáπ">
–ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π —É–∂–∏–Ω ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ —Ü–µ–ª—ã–π —Ä–∏—Ç—É–∞–ª! Antipasto (–∑–∞–∫—É—Å–∫–∞), primo (–ø–µ—Ä–≤–æ–µ ‚Äî –ø–∞—Å—Ç–∞), secondo (–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–µ ‚Äî –º—è—Å–æ/—Ä—ã–±–∞), dolce (–¥–µ—Å–µ—Ä—Ç). –ù–µ —Å–ø–µ—à–∏—Ç–µ!
</CultureTip>

### –í–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –µ–¥—ã

<VocabCard
  word="√à squisito!"
  translation="–≠—Ç–æ –∏–∑—ã—Å–∫–∞–Ω–Ω–æ!"
  pronunciation="—ç —Å–∫–≤–∏–∑–∏—Ç–æ"
  example="Mmm, questa pasta √® squisita!"
/>

- **"Buonissimo!"** [–±—É–æ–Ω–∏—Å—Å–∏–º–æ] ‚Äî –û—á–µ–Ω—å –≤–∫—É—Å–Ω–æ!
- **"Il vino √® eccellente"** [–∏–ª—å –≤–∏–Ω–æ —ç —ç—á—á—ç–ª–ª—ç–Ω—Ç—ç] ‚Äî –í–∏–Ω–æ –ø—Ä–µ–≤–æ—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ–µ
- **"Vuoi assaggiare?"** [–≤—É–æ–π –∞—Å—Å–∞–¥–∂–∞—Ä—ç] ‚Äî –•–æ—á–µ—à—å –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å?
- **"Cin cin!"** [—á–∏–Ω —á–∏–Ω] ‚Äî –ß–∏–Ω-—á–∏–Ω! (—Ç–æ—Å—Ç)

### –°—á—ë—Ç

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------------------|--------------|---------|
| **Il conto, per favore** | –∏–ª—å –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–æ, –ø—ç—Ä —Ñ–∞–≤–æ—Ä—ç | –°—á—ë—Ç, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞ |
| **Pago io** | –ø–∞–≥–æ –∏–æ | –Ø –ø–ª–∞—á—É |
| **Offro io** | –æ—Ñ—Ñ—Ä–æ –∏–æ | –Ø —É–≥–æ—â–∞—é |
| **Facciamo a met√†?** | —Ñ–∞—á—á–∞–º–æ –∞ –º—ç—Ç–∞ | –ü–æ–ø–æ–ª–∞–º? |

<CultureTip title="Coperto –∏ —á–∞–µ–≤—ã–µ" flag="üáÆüáπ">
–í –ò—Ç–∞–ª–∏–∏ –≤ —Å—á—ë—Ç —á–∞—Å—Ç–æ –≤–∫–ª—é—á—ë–Ω ¬´coperto¬ª ‚Äî –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞ –∑–∞ —Å–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å –∏ —Ö–ª–µ–± (1-3 –µ–≤—Ä–æ —Å —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–∞). –î–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —á–∞–µ–≤—ã–µ –Ω–µ–æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã, –Ω–æ –æ–∫—Ä—É–≥–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—á—ë—Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç—Å—è.
</CultureTip>

## –ù–∞ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—É–ª–∫–µ

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Facciamo una passeggiata?"
  translation="–ü—Ä–æ–≥—É–ª—è–µ–º—Å—è?"
  pronunciation="—Ñ–∞—á—á–∞–º–æ —É–Ω–∞ –ø–∞—Å—Å—ç–¥–∂–∞—Ç–∞"
  context="–†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–µ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Che bella serata!"
  translation="–ö–∞–∫–æ–π –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä!"
  pronunciation="–∫—ç –±—ç–ª–ª–∞ —Å—ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∞"
  example="Guarda le stelle! Che bella serata!"
/>

### –†–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—ã –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–≥—É–ª–∫–∏:

- **"Dammi la mano"** [–¥–∞–º–º–∏ –ª–∞ –º–∞–Ω–æ] ‚Äî –î–∞–π –º–Ω–µ —Ä—É–∫—É
- **"Guarda le stelle"** [–≥—É–∞—Ä–¥–∞ –ª—ç —Å—Ç—ç–ª–ª—ç] ‚Äî –ü–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏ –Ω–∞ –∑–≤—ë–∑–¥—ã
- **"√à cos√¨ romantico"** [—ç –∫–æ–∑–∏ —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–∫–æ] ‚Äî –≠—Ç–æ —Ç–∞–∫ —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω–æ
- **"Mi piace stare con te"** [–º–∏ –ø—å—è—á—ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ç –∫–æ–Ω —Ç—ç] ‚Äî –ú–Ω–µ –Ω—Ä–∞–≤–∏—Ç—Å—è –±—ã—Ç—å —Å —Ç–æ–±–æ–π

## –ö–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏

<VocabCard
  word="Sei bellissima stasera"
  translation="–¢—ã –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–∞ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä–æ–º"
  pronunciation="—Å—ç–π –±—ç–ª–ª–∏—Å—Å–∏–º–∞ —Å—Ç–∞—Å—ç—Ä–∞"
  example="Wow! Sei bellissima stasera, amore!"
/>

### –ö–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã:

| –§—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------|--------------|---------|
| **Sei stupendo/a** | —Å—ç–π —Å—Ç—É–ø—ç–Ω–¥–æ/–∞ | –¢—ã –ø–æ—Ç—Ä—è—Å–∞—é—â–∏–π/–∞—è |
| **Questo vestito ti sta benissimo** | –∫—É—ç—Å—Ç–æ –≤—ç—Å—Ç–∏—Ç–æ —Ç–∏ —Å—Ç–∞ –±—ç–Ω–∏—Å—Å–∏–º–æ | –≠—Ç–æ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—å–µ —Ç–µ–±–µ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –∏–¥—ë—Ç |
| **Hai degli occhi meravigliosi** | –∞–π –¥—ç–ª—å–∏ –æ–∫–∫–∏ –º—ç—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–æ–∑–∏ | –£ —Ç–µ–±—è —á—É–¥–µ—Å–Ω—ã–µ –≥–ª–∞–∑–∞ |
| **Profumi benissimo** | –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ—É–º–∏ –±—ç–Ω–∏—Å—Å–∏–º–æ | –û—Ç —Ç–µ–±—è –ø—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ –ø–∞—Ö–Ω–µ—Ç |

## –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è –∫—É—Ö–Ω—è ‚Äî —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ä—å

<VocabCard
  word="Antipasto, Primo, Secondo, Dolce"
  translation="–ó–∞–∫—É—Å–∫–∞, –ü–µ—Ä–≤–æ–µ, –í—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–µ, –î–µ—Å–µ—Ä—Ç"
  pronunciation="–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–ø–∞—Å—Ç–æ, –ø—Ä–∏–º–æ, —Å—ç–∫–æ–Ω–¥–æ, –¥–æ–ª—å—á—ç"
  example="–°—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞ –∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ —É–∂–∏–Ω–∞"
/>

### –ü–æ–ø—É–ª—è—Ä–Ω—ã–µ –±–ª—é–¥–∞:

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------------|--------------|---------|
| **la pasta** | –ª–∞ –ø–∞—Å—Ç–∞ | –ø–∞—Å—Ç–∞ |
| **la pizza** | –ª–∞ –ø–∏—Ü—Ü–∞ | –ø–∏—Ü—Ü–∞ |
| **il risotto** | –∏–ª—å —Ä–∏–∑–æ—Ç—Ç–æ | —Ä–∏–∑–æ—Ç—Ç–æ |
| **l'insalata** | –ª–∏–Ω—Å–∞–ª–∞—Ç–∞ | —Å–∞–ª–∞—Ç |
| **il tiramis√π** | –∏–ª—å —Ç–∏—Ä–∞–º–∏—Å—É | —Ç–∏—Ä–∞–º–∏—Å—É |
| **il gelato** | –∏–ª—å –¥–∂—ç–ª–∞—Ç–æ | –º–æ—Ä–æ–∂–µ–Ω–æ–µ |

### –ù–∞–ø–∏—Ç–∫–∏:

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------------|--------------|---------|
| **il vino rosso** | –∏–ª—å –≤–∏–Ω–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Å–æ | –∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω–æ–µ –≤–∏–Ω–æ |
| **il vino bianco** | –∏–ª—å –≤–∏–Ω–æ –±—å—è–Ω–∫–æ | –±–µ–ª–æ–µ –≤–∏–Ω–æ |
| **lo spumante** | –ª–æ —Å–ø—É–º–∞–Ω—Ç—ç | –∏–≥—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–æ–µ |
| **l'acqua** | –ª–∞–∫–∫—É–∞ | –≤–æ–¥–∞ |
| **il caff√®** | –∏–ª—å –∫–∞—Ñ—Ñ—ç | –∫–æ—Ñ–µ |

<CultureTip title="–ê–ø–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏–≤–æ" flag="üáÆüáπ">
–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü–∏—è ¬´–∞–ø–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–∏–≤–æ¬ª ‚Äî –ª—ë–≥–∫–∏–π –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Ç–æ–∫ —Å –∑–∞–∫—É—Å–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —É–∂–∏–Ω–æ–º (17:00-20:00). –ü—Ä–µ–∫—Ä–∞—Å–Ω—ã–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± –Ω–∞—á–∞—Ç—å —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä! –ü–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±—É–π—Ç–µ Aperol Spritz –∏–ª–∏ Negroni.
</CultureTip>

## –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è

<VocabCard
  word="√à stata una serata meravigliosa"
  translation="–≠—Ç–æ –±—ã–ª —á—É–¥–µ—Å–Ω—ã–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä"
  pronunciation="—ç —Å—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ —É–Ω–∞ —Å—ç—Ä–∞—Ç–∞ –º—ç—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–æ–∑–∞"
  example="Grazie, √® stata una serata meravigliosa con te."
/>

### –ü—Ä–æ—â–∞–Ω–∏–µ:

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∞—è —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∞ | –ü–µ—Ä–µ–≤–æ–¥ |
|-------------------|---------|
| **Non voglio che finisca questa serata** | –ù–µ —Ö–æ—á—É, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä –∑–∞–∫–∞–Ω—á–∏–≤–∞–ª—Å—è |
| **Quando ci rivediamo?** | –ö–æ–≥–¥–∞ —É–≤–∏–¥–∏–º—Å—è —Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞? |
| **Scrivimi quando arrivi a casa** | –ù–∞–ø–∏—à–∏, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –¥–æ–±–µ—Ä—ë—à—å—Å—è |
| **Buonanotte, tesoro. Sogni d'oro** | –°–ø–æ–∫–æ–π–Ω–æ–π –Ω–æ—á–∏. –ó–æ–ª–æ—Ç—ã—Ö —Å–Ω–æ–≤ |

## –°–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ä—å —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä–∞

| –ò—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π | –ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ | –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π |
|-------------|--------------|---------|
| **l'appuntamento** | –ª–∞–ø–ø—É–Ω—Ç–∞–º—ç–Ω—Ç–æ | —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ |
| **la cena** | –ª–∞ —á–µ–Ω–∞ | —É–∂–∏–Ω |
| **le candele** | –ª—ç –∫–∞–Ω–¥—ç–ª—ç | —Å–≤–µ—á–∏ |
| **il bacio** | –∏–ª—å –±–∞—á–æ | –ø–æ—Ü–µ–ª—É–π |
| **l'abbraccio** | –ª–∞–±–±—Ä–∞—á—á–æ | –æ–±—ä—è—Ç–∏–µ |
| **romantico/a** | —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–∫–æ/–∞ | —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ã–π/–∞—è |

## –ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —É–ø—Ä–∞–∂–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è

### –†–æ–ª–µ–≤–∞—è –∏–≥—Ä–∞ ¬´–í —Ä–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–Ω–µ¬ª:
–û–¥–∏–Ω ‚Äî –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–Ω—Ç, –¥—Ä—É–≥–æ–π ‚Äî –≥–æ—Å—Ç—å. –ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ –ø–æ-–∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏!

### ¬´–ö–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –Ω–∞ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è¬ª:
–ó–∞ –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç—É —Å–∫–∞–∂–∏—Ç–µ –∫–∞–∫ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–∏–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–æ–º.

### ¬´–ü–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ¬ª:
- "Dove vuoi andare stasera?"
- "Vorrei provare il nuovo ristorante italiano."
- "A che ora ci troviamo?"

Una serata indimenticabile vi aspetta! (–í–∞—Å –∂–¥—ë—Ç –Ω–µ–∑–∞–±—ã–≤–∞–µ–º—ã–π –≤–µ—á–µ—Ä!)

## –ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂–∏—Ç—å –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ

- **[–ö–∞–∫ —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç—å ¬´–Ø —Ç–µ–±—è –ª—é–±–ª—é¬ª](/learn/ru/it/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-italian/)** - –ì–ª–∞–≤–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞
- **[–õ–∞—Å–∫–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ–∑–≤–∏—â–∞](/learn/ru/it/italian-pet-names-terms-of-endearment/)** - –ù–µ–∂–Ω—ã–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞
- **[–ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ](/learn/ru/it/italian-pronunciation-guide/)** - –û—Å–≤–æ–π—Ç–µ –∑–≤—É–∫–∏

<CTA text="–ü—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É–π—Ç–µ –∏—Ç–∞–ª—å—è–Ω—Å–∫–∏–π –¥–ª—è —Å–≤–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–π —Å AI-—Å–æ–±–µ—Å–µ–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º: –≥–æ–ª–æ—Å–æ–≤—ã–µ –¥–∏–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏ –≤ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–µ —Ä–µ–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–∏, –ª–∏—á–Ω—ã–π —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞—Ä—å Love Log –∏ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –¥–∞—Ä–∏—Ç—å –ª—é–±–∏–º—ã–º —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ Word Gifts. 306 —è–∑—ã–∫–æ–≤—ã—Ö –ø–∞—Ä –¥–ª—è –º–Ω–æ–≥–æ—è–∑—ã—á–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π." buttonText="–ù–∞—á–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫—É –±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ" />

articles.title: Danish Honeymoon Travel Phrases: Romantic Vocabulary for Your Trip
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Your bryllupsrejse is the perfect time to practice Danish in a romantisk setting. Whether you're traveling to a Danish-speaking destination or simply want to share romantisk moments in your partner's language, these travel phrases will make your rejse even more special.

For more romantic expressions, check out our guide on [Danish romantic phrases for every occasion](/blog/en/danish-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="bryllupsrejse"
  translation="honeymoon"
  pronunciation="bryllupsrejse"
  context="The most romantic trip of your lives."
/>

## Essential Honeymoon Vocabulary

<VocabCard
  word="romantisk"
  translation="romantic"
  pronunciation="romantisk"
  example="This is so romantisk!"
/>

| Danish | English | Context |
|---|---|---|
| bryllupsrejse | honeymoon | Your special trip |
| rejse | trip | The journey |
| destination | destination | Where you're going |
| romantisk | romantic | The mood |
| strand | beach | Popular setting |
| hotel | hotel | Accommodation |
| pas | passport | Essential document |
| eventyr | adventure | Exciting experiences |
| minder | memories | What you'll create |
| paradis | paradise | Perfect place |

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá∞" title="Danish Honeymoon Destinations">
Danish-speaking countries offer incredible bryllupsrejse destinations, from beautiful strandes to charming cities. Consider destinations where you can practice the language while enjoying romantisk experiences.
</CultureTip>

## Planning Your Trip

### Choosing a Destination
- **Where should we go for our bryllupsrejse?** - Starting the conversation
- **I'd love a strand destination** - Expressing preference
- **Let's find the perfect hotel** - Accommodation search
- **This looks like paradis!** - Excitement

### Booking Vocabulary
| Danish | English | When to Use |
|---|---|---|
| hotel | hotel | Booking accommodation |
| rejse | trip | Planning journey |
| destination | destination | Choosing where |
| pas | passport | Document check |
| Reservation | reservation | Booking |

<VocabCard
  word="paradis"
  translation="paradise"
  pronunciation="paradis"
  example="This strand is paradis!"
/>

## At the Airport

### Essential Phrases
- **Our bryllupsrejse begins!** - Excited departure
- **Do you have your pas?** - Practical check
- **What an eventyr!** - Expressing excitement
- **Can't wait to arrive!** - Anticipation

### Airport Vocabulary
| Danish | English | Context |
|---|---|---|
| pas | passport | At check-in |
| Flight | flight | Transportation |
| Gate | gate | Finding your flight |
| rejse | trip | Overall journey |

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá∞" title="Travel Etiquette">
When traveling to Danish-speaking destinations, basic phrases like "please" and "thank you" in Danish are greatly appreciated. Locals often respond warmly to tourists who make an effort to speak their language.
</CultureTip>

## At Your Hotel

### Checking In
- **We're on our bryllupsrejse** - Special occasion mention
- **A romantisk room, please** - Room preference
- **We have a reservation** - Confirmation
- **This is beautiful!** - First impressions

### Room Types
| Danish | English | Description |
|---|---|---|
| romantisk room | romantic room | Special ambiance |
| Suite | suite | Luxury option |
| Ocean view | ocean view | strand destination |
| hotel | hotel | General accommodation |

<VocabCard
  word="strand"
  translation="beach"
  pronunciation="strand"
  example="Let's go to the strand!"
/>

## Romantic Moments

### On the Beach
- **This strand is perfect** - Appreciation
- **What a romantisk sunset** - Romantic moment
- **I love you** - Essential phrase
- **This is paradis** - Pure bliss

### At Dinner
| Moment | Danish | English |
|---|---|---|
| Arrival | Table for two | Restaurant entry |
| Toast | To our bryllupsrejse! | Celebrating |
| Gratitude | Thank you | Appreciation |
| Romance | This is romantisk | Setting the mood |

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá∞" title="Romantic Dining">
In Danish-speaking countries, romantic dinners often start late and last for hours. Embrace the local pace and enjoy quality time together without rushing.
</CultureTip>

## Adventure Activities

### Exploring Together
- **Let's go on an eventyr!** - Suggesting activities
- **This rejse is amazing** - Expressing joy
- **We're making beautiful minder** - Reflection
- **I'll never forget this** - Creating memories

### Activity Vocabulary
| Danish | English | Activity Type |
|---|---|---|
| eventyr | adventure | Exciting activity |
| strand | beach | Relaxing |
| Explore | explore | Discovering |
| minder | memories | What you're creating |

## Creating Memories

### Photo Moment Phrases
- **Take a photo of us!** - Requesting photos
- **bryllupsrejse minder!** - Caption
- **Best rejse ever!** - Enthusiasm
- **To our eventyr!** - Celebration

<VocabCard
  word="minder"
  translation="memories"
  pronunciation="minder"
  example="We're making beautiful minder."
/>

## Returning Home

### End of Trip
- **What an amazing bryllupsrejse!** - Reflection
- **I don't want to leave!** - Bittersweet feeling
- **We'll be back** - Future plans
- **Thank you for this rejse** - Gratitude

For more travel vocabulary, explore our [Danish date night vocabulary](/blog/en/danish-date-night-vocabulary) guide for romantic outings at home.

## Quick Reference Card

| Need | Vocabulary |
|---|---|
| Planning | destination, hotel, rejse |
| Travel | pas, eventyr |
| Romance | romantisk, strand, paradis |
| Memories | minder, bryllupsrejse |

Your bryllupsrejse in Danish will create minder that last a lifetime. Every romantisk phrase spoken, every eventyr shared, becomes part of your beautiful love story.

<CTA />

articles.title: Niederl√§ndische SMS-Sprache und Chat-Slang
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

# Niederl√§ndische SMS-Sprache und Chat-Slang f√ºr Paare

Wenn du mit deinem niederl√§ndischen Partner textest, wirst du schnell merken, dass die Chat-Sprache k√ºrzer und lockerer ist. Hier lernst du die wichtigsten Abk√ºrzungen.

## Die wichtigste Textnachricht

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Ik hou van je ‚ù§Ô∏è"
  translation="Ich liebe dich"
  pronunciation="ik hau fan je"
  context="Die wichtigste Nachricht - oft abgek√ºrzt als 'IHvj' oder mit Herz-Emojis."
/>

## H√§ufige Abk√ºrzungen

<VocabCard
  word="Hoi / Hey"
  translation="Hi / Hey"
  pronunciation="hoj / hej"
  example="Die universelle Chat-Begr√º√üung."
/>

| Abk√ºrzung | Bedeutet | Deutsch |
|-----------|----------|---------|
| **IHvj** | Ik hou van je | Ich liebe dich |
| **Hvj** | Hou van je | Hab dich lieb |
| **Idd** | Inderdaad | Tats√§chlich |
| **Ff** | Even(tjes) | Kurz/mal eben |
| **Gwn** | Gewoon | Einfach/normal |
| **Bv** | Bijvoorbeeld | Zum Beispiel |
| **Wb** | Welterusten/Welterusten bekkie | Gute Nacht |
| **Xje** | Kusje | K√ºsschen |

<CultureTip title="Niederl√§nder und Englisch" flag="üá≥üá±">
Niederl√§nder mischen oft Englisch in ihre Chats! "That's nice", "Cool", "Whatever" und "OMG" sind v√∂llig normal. Lass dich nicht verwirren, wenn dein Partner pl√∂tzlich Englisch schreibt.
</CultureTip>

## Liebevolle Chat-Ausdr√ºcke

<VocabCard
  word="Ik mis je üíï"
  translation="Ich vermisse dich"
  pronunciation="ik mis je"
  example="Perfekt f√ºr Nachrichten, wenn ihr getrennt seid."
/>

| Niederl√§ndisch | Deutsch | Verwendung |
|----------------|---------|------------|
| **Schatje** | Sch√§tzchen | Anrede |
| **Liefje** | Liebchen | Anrede |
| **Xje** | K√ºsschen | Am Ende |
| **Knuffel** | Umarmung | Liebevoll |
| **Waar ben je?** | Wo bist du? | Nachfragen |
| **Ik wacht op je** | Ich warte auf dich | Vorfreude |

## Chat-Slang

<VocabCard
  word="Wajo / Wauw"
  translation="Wow"
  pronunciation="wa-JO / wau"
  example="Ausdruck der √úberraschung oder Begeisterung."
/>

| Slang | Bedeutung | Kontext |
|-------|-----------|---------|
| **Chill** | Cool/entspannt | Jugendsprache |
| **Vet** | Cool (w√∂rtl. "fett") | Begeisterung |
| **Gast** | Typ/Kerl | Informell |
| **Lekker** | Nice/gut | Vielseitig |
| **Gezellig** | Gem√ºtlich | Positive Stimmung |
| **Ja toch** | Ja, oder? | Zustimmung suchen |
| **Haha / Hihi** | Haha | Lachen |

<CultureTip title="Lekker - Das Allround-Wort" flag="üá≥üá±">
"Lekker" bedeutet eigentlich "lecker", wird aber f√ºr fast alles Positive verwendet: "Lekker weer" (sch√∂nes Wetter), "Lekker slapen" (gut schlafen), "Dat is lekker" (das ist gut). Du wirst es st√§ndig in Chats sehen!
</CultureTip>

## Emojis und ihre Bedeutung

Niederl√§nder nutzen Emojis √§hnlich wie Deutsche:

| Emoji | Verwendung im Niederl√§ndischen |
|-------|-------------------------------|
| ‚ù§Ô∏è | Liefde (Liebe) |
| üòò | Kusje (K√ºsschen) |
| ü•∞ | Verliefd |
| üòä | Blij (gl√ºcklich) |
| üôà | Verlegen |
| üëç | Ok√©/Prima |
| üòÇ | Lachen |
| ü§ó | Knuffel (Umarmung) |

## Typische Chat-Gespr√§che

### Morgen-Chat

**A:** Goeiemorgen schatje ‚òÄÔ∏è

**B:** Morgen liefje üòò Lekker geslapen?

**A:** Ja, jij?

**B:** Ook. Ik mis je al üíï

**A:** Aww ‚ù§Ô∏è Vanavond zien we elkaar!

**B:** Kan niet wachten! Xje

### Tags√ºber

<VocabCard
  word="Wat ben je aan het doen?"
  translation="Was machst du gerade?"
  pronunciation="wat ben je aan et dun"
  example="Die klassische Zwischen-durch-Nachricht."
/>

**A:** Hey, hoe gaat ie?

**B:** Goed, ff druk op werk üò¥ Jij?

**A:** Gwn thuis. Mis je!

**B:** ‚ù§Ô∏è Straks bellen?

**A:** Ja! üëç

### Abend-Chat

**A:** Ben thuis!

**B:** Gezellig ü§ó Kom je langs?

**A:** Over 20 min ben ik er

**B:** Top! Xje

## Flirten per Chat

<VocabCard
  word="Ik denk steeds aan je"
  translation="Ich denke st√§ndig an dich"
  pronunciation="ik denk steets aan je"
  example="Romantische Nachricht f√ºr zwischendurch."
/>

| Niederl√§ndisch | Deutsch | Wann senden |
|----------------|---------|-------------|
| **Je bent zo mooi** | Du bist so sch√∂n | Kompliment |
| **Ik verlang naar je** | Ich sehne mich nach dir | Romantisch |
| **Kan niet stoppen met aan je denken** | Kann nicht aufh√∂ren, an dich zu denken | Sehr romantisch |
| **Zin om af te spreken?** | Lust, dich zu treffen? | Date planen |

<CultureTip title="Videobellen" flag="üá≥üá±">
Niederl√§nder "facetimen" gerne! "Zullen we ff facetimen?" oder "Videobellen?" ist eine normale Frage. Das ist eine tolle M√∂glichkeit, dein Niederl√§ndisch zu √ºben!
</CultureTip>

## Reaktionen und Antworten

| Niederl√§ndisch | Deutsch | Wann verwenden |
|----------------|---------|----------------|
| **Haha / üòÇ** | Haha | Lustig |
| **Lief** | S√º√ü/lieb | Niedlich |
| **Wauw** | Wow | Beeindruckend |
| **Oh jee** | Oh je | √úberraschung |
| **Echt waar?** | Echt wahr? | Unglaube |
| **Nice** | Nice | Zustimmung |
| **Ok√©, prima** | OK, in Ordnung | Best√§tigung |

## Abk√ºrzungen f√ºr Zeitangaben

| Abk√ºrzung | Bedeutet | Deutsch |
|-----------|----------|---------|
| **vnd** | Vanavond | Heute Abend |
| **mrg** | Morgen | Morgen |
| **zo** | Zo / Zondag | Gleich / Sonntag |
| **nu** | Nu | Jetzt |
| **straks** | Straks | Gleich/sp√§ter |
| **wknd** | Weekend | Wochenende |

## Verabschiedungen per Chat

| Niederl√§ndisch | Deutsch | Kontext |
|----------------|---------|---------|
| **Doei üëã** | Tsch√ºss | Standard |
| **Xje / Kusje üòò** | K√ºsschen | Liebevoll |
| **Welterusten üåô** | Gute Nacht | Abends |
| **Slaap lekker üí§** | Schlaf gut | Vor dem Schlafen |
| **Tot zo** | Bis gleich | Bis sp√§ter |
| **Spreek je** | Wir sprechen uns | Verabschiedung |

## Schnellreferenz

**Begr√º√üung:** Hoi! / Hey!

**Liebe:** IHvj ‚ù§Ô∏è (Ich liebe dich) / Xje üòò (K√ºsschen)

**Vermissen:** Ik mis je / Denk aan je

**Zustimmung:** Ok√© / Nice / Top

**Abschied:** Doei / Xje / Slaap lekker

Mit diesen Ausdr√ºcken bist du bereit f√ºr lockere Chats mit deinem niederl√§ndischen Partner!

<CTA />

articles.title: Nizozemsk√© fr√°ze pro h√°dky a neshody ve vztahu
articles.content:
Nizozemci jsou zn√°m√≠ svou p≈ô√≠most√≠ a up≈ô√≠mnost√≠. V nizozemsk√© kultu≈ôe se otev≈ôenƒõ mluv√≠ o probl√©mech, co≈æ m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt pro ƒåechy osvƒõ≈æuj√≠c√≠, ale i p≈ôekvapiv√©.

## Z√°kladn√≠ fr√°ze pro vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ nesouhlasu

### 1. Ik ben het niet met je eens
**V√Ωslovnost:** ik ben het n√≠t met je √©ns

**V√Ωznam:** Nesouhlas√≠m s tebou

P≈ô√≠m√Ω zp≈Øsob vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ nesouhlasu.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Ik ben het niet met je eens, maar ik wil je wel begrijpen." (Nesouhlas√≠m s tebou, ale chci ti rozumƒõt.)

### 2. Ik zie het anders
**V√Ωslovnost:** ik z√≠ het anders

**V√Ωznam:** J√° to vid√≠m jinak

Mƒõkƒç√≠ zp≈Øsob vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ odli≈°n√©ho pohledu.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Ik zie het anders. Kunnen we er rustig over praten?" (J√° to vid√≠m jinak. M≈Ø≈æeme o tom mluvit v klidu?)

### 3. Ik voel me gekwetst als je...
**V√Ωslovnost:** ik f√∫l me checvest als je

**V√Ωznam:** C√≠t√≠m se zranƒõn√Ω/√°, kdy≈æ ty...

Pro vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ emoc√≠ bez obvi≈àov√°n√≠.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Ik voel me gekwetst als je niet naar me luistert." (C√≠t√≠m se zranƒõn√Ω/√°, kdy≈æ mƒõ neposlouch√°≈°.)

### 4. Schreeuw alsjeblieft niet tegen me
**V√Ωslovnost:** schr√©v alsjeblieft n√≠t t√©chen me

**V√Ωznam:** Pros√≠m, nek≈ôiƒç na mƒõ

Pro uklidnƒõn√≠ situace.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Schreeuw alsjeblieft niet tegen me. Ik wil dit rustig oplossen." (Pros√≠m, nek≈ôiƒç na mƒõ. Chci to vy≈ôe≈°it v klidu.)

### 5. Ik heb tijd nodig om na te denken
**V√Ωslovnost:** ik heb tajt n√≥dich om n√° te denken

**V√Ωznam:** Pot≈ôebuji ƒças na p≈ôem√Ω≈°len√≠

Pro z√≠sk√°n√≠ prostoru.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Ik heb tijd nodig om na te denken. Kunnen we later verder praten?" (Pot≈ôebuji ƒças na p≈ôem√Ω≈°len√≠. M≈Ø≈æeme pokraƒçovat pozdƒõji?)

## Fr√°ze pro pochopen√≠ partnera

### 6. Help me om jouw standpunt te begrijpen
**V√Ωslovnost:** help me om jau stantpunt te bechrajpen

**V√Ωznam:** Pomoz mi pochopit tv≈Øj √∫hel pohledu

Ukazuje ochotu naslouchat.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Help me om jouw standpunt te begrijpen. Ik wil dit echt oplossen." (Pomoz mi pochopit tv≈Øj √∫hel pohledu. Opravdu to chci vy≈ôe≈°it.)

### 7. Wat ik probeer te zeggen is...
**V√Ωslovnost:** vat ik prob√©r te zechen is

**V√Ωznam:** Co se sna≈æ√≠m ≈ô√≠ct je...

Pro up≈ôesnƒõn√≠ my≈°lenky.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Wat ik probeer te zeggen is dat ik je mis." (Co se sna≈æ√≠m ≈ô√≠ct je, ≈æe mi chyb√≠≈°.)

### 8. Bedoel je dat...?
**V√Ωslovnost:** bed√∫l je dat

**V√Ωznam:** Mysl√≠≈° t√≠m, ≈æe...?

Pro ovƒõ≈ôen√≠ porozumƒõn√≠.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Bedoel je dat je je eenzaam voelt?" (Mysl√≠≈° t√≠m, ≈æe se c√≠t√≠≈° osamƒõl√Ω/√°?)

## Fr√°ze pro hled√°n√≠ ≈ôe≈°en√≠

### 9. Laten we een compromis zoeken
**V√Ωslovnost:** l√°ten ve en kompromis z√∫ken

**V√Ωznam:** Hledejme kompromis

Konstruktivn√≠ p≈ô√≠stup.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Laten we een compromis zoeken dat voor ons allebei werkt." (Hledejme kompromis, kter√Ω bude fungovat pro n√°s oba.)

### 10. Ik wil hier geen ruzie over maken
**V√Ωslovnost:** ik vil h√≠r ch√©n ruzi √≥ver m√°ken

**V√Ωznam:** Nechci se kv≈Øli tomu h√°dat

Vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ touhy po m√≠ru.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Ik wil hier geen ruzie over maken. Ik hou te veel van je." (Nechci se kv≈Øli tomu h√°dat. Moc tƒõ miluji.)

### 11. We zijn een team
**V√Ωslovnost:** ve zajn en t√≠m

**V√Ωznam:** Jsme t√Ωm

P≈ôipom√≠n√° partnerstv√≠.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Vergeet niet dat we een team zijn, schat." (Nezapome≈à, ≈æe jsme t√Ωm, mil√°ƒçku.)

### 12. Kunnen we opnieuw beginnen?
**V√Ωslovnost:** kunen ve opn√≠uv bechinnen

**V√Ωznam:** M≈Ø≈æeme zaƒç√≠t znovu?

Pro nov√Ω zaƒç√°tek.

**P≈ô√≠klad pou≈æit√≠:**
- "Dit gesprek ging fout. Kunnen we opnieuw beginnen?" (Tento rozhovor se pokazil. M≈Ø≈æeme zaƒç√≠t znovu?)

## Kulturn√≠ tipy

Nizozemci jsou velmi p≈ô√≠m√≠ - co si mysl√≠, to ≈ôeknou. Tato up≈ô√≠mnost nen√≠ nezdvo≈ôilost, je to kulturn√≠ norma. Osloven√≠ jako "schat" (poklad), "lieverd" (mil√°ƒçku), "liefje" (l√°sko) jsou bƒõ≈æn√°. D≈Øle≈æit√© je neschov√°vat emoce, ale vyjad≈ôovat je konstruktivnƒõ.

## Z√°vƒõr

Tyto fr√°ze v√°m pomohou navigovat p≈ô√≠mou nizozemskou komunikaci bƒõhem nesouhlasu. Pamatujte, ≈æe v Nizozemsku je p≈ô√≠moƒçarost zn√°mkou respektu - lid√© v√°m ≈ôeknou pravdu, proto≈æe v√°m d≈Øvƒõ≈ôuj√≠.

Los checos valoran la sinceridad directa al pedir perd√≥n. Estas frases te ayudar√°n.
